AlertDescription.AlertsQuery:
select * from SMS_Alert where AlertState = 0 and FeatureGroup = 4 and IsIgnored = 0
select * from SMS_EPAlert where AlertState = 0 and FeatureGroup = 4 and IsIgnored = 0
select * from SMS_CHAlert where AlertState = 0 and FeatureGroup = 4 and IsIgnored = 0

QueryDescription.Query: SELECT * FROM SMS_CombinedUserResources
SELECT * FROM SMS_G_SYSTEM_ResourceClientSettingsAssignment WHERE ResourceID=##SUB:ResourceID##
SELECT * FROM SMS_ClientSettingsDefault
SELECT * FROM SMS_CombinedDeviceResources WHERE ((ClientType is null AND EASDeviceID is null) OR ClientType != 3)

SecurityFlagsDetailDescription.BitName: NetworkAccess | Modify CH Settings | Enforce Security

QueryDescription.Query: SELECT * FROM SMS_CH_EvalResult WHERE ResourceID=##SUB:ResourceID##
SELECT * FROM SMS_G_System_Threats WHERE ResourceID=##SUB:ResourceID## AND DATEDIFF(dd,detectiontime,GetDate())<180
SELECT * FROM SMS_G_System_AmPolicyStatus WHERE ResourceID=##SUB:ResourceID##
SELECT * FROM SMS_G_SYSTEM_ResourceClientSettingsAssignment WHERE ResourceID=##SUB:ResourceID##
SELECT * FROM SMS_ClientSettingsDefault
SELECT * FROM SMS_DeviceCollectionMember WHERE MachineID=##SUB:ResourceID##

SELECT SMS_SoftwareUpdate.* FROM SMS_R_System JOIN SMS_UpdateComplianceStatus ON SMS_R_System.ResourceID = SMS_UpdateComplianceStatus.MachineID JOIN SMS_SoftwareUpdate ON SMS_UpdateComplianceStatus.CI_ID = SMS_SoftwareUpdate.CI_ID AND SMS_UpdateComplianceStatus.Status = 2 AND SMS_SoftwareUpdate.IsHidden = 0 AND SMS_SoftwareUpdate.IsExpired = 0 AND SMS_SoftwareUpdate.NumMissing > 0 AND SMS_SoftwareUpdate.IsSuperseded = 0 WHERE SMS_R_System.ResourceID=##SUB:ResourceID##
SELECT * FROM SMS_CombinedDeviceResources WHERE ClientType=3 AND ResourceType=5
SELECT * FROM SMS_CH_EvalResult WHERE ResourceID=##SUB:ResourceID##
SELECT * FROM SMS_G_SYSTEM_ResourceClientSettingsAssignment WHERE ResourceID=##SUB:ResourceID##
SELECT * FROM SMS_ClientSettingsDefault
SELECT * FROM SMS_MDMDeviceThreat WHERE DeviceId='##SUB:SMSID##'
SELECT * FROM SMS_DeviceCollectionMember WHERE MachineID=##SUB:ResourceID##
SELECT * FROM SMS_CombinedDeviceResources WHERE ClientType is null AND EASDeviceID is NOT null AND ResourceType=5
SELECT * FROM SMS_G_SYSTEM_ResourceClientSettingsAssignment WHERE ResourceID=##SUB:ResourceID##
SELECT * FROM SMS_ClientSettingsDefault
SELECT * FROM SMS_DeviceCollectionMember WHERE MachineID=##SUB:ResourceID##
SELECT * FROM SMS_Collection WHERE CollectionType=1 ORDER BY Name
SELECT * FROM SMS_DeploymentSummary WHERE CollectionID='##SUB:CollectionID##'

SELECT cs.* FROM SMS_ClientSettings AS cs JOIN SMS_ClientSettingsAssignment AS csa ON cs.SettingsID=csa.ClientSettingsID JOIN SMS_Collection AS c ON csa.CollectionID=c.CollectionID WHERE csa.CollectionID='##SUB:CollectionID##'
SELECT * FROM SMS_Collection WHERE CollectionType=1 ORDER BY Name
SELECT * FROM SMS_DeploymentSummary WHERE CollectionID='##SUB:CollectionID##'

SELECT cs.* FROM SMS_ClientSettings AS cs JOIN SMS_ClientSettingsAssignment AS csa ON cs.SettingsID=csa.ClientSettingsID JOIN SMS_Collection AS c ON csa.CollectionID=c.CollectionID WHERE csa.CollectionID='##SUB:CollectionID##'
SELECT * FROM SMS_CollectionEvaluationFullAllSite AS cef WHERE cef.CollectionID='##SUB:CollectionID##'
SELECT * FROM SMS_CollectionEvaluationIncrementalAllSite AS cef WHERE cef.CollectionID='##SUB:CollectionID##'
SELECT * FROM SMS_Collection WHERE CollectionType=2 ORDER BY Name

SecurityFlagsDetailDescription.BitName: NetworkAccess | Modify CH Settings | Enforce Security
CreateTaskSequenceMedia | View CH Settings | Associate | Associate Site System | ModifyPolicy | DeployApplications

QueryDescription.Query: SELECT * FROM SMS_DeploymentSummary WHERE CollectionID='##SUB:CollectionID##'

SELECT cs.* FROM SMS_ClientSettings AS cs JOIN SMS_ClientSettingsAssignment AS csa ON cs.SettingsID=csa.ClientSettingsID JOIN SMS_Collection AS c ON csa.CollectionID=c.CollectionID WHERE csa.CollectionID='##SUB:CollectionID##'

SELECT DISTINCT SMS_SoftwareUpdate.* FROM SMS_R_System JOIN SMS_FullCollectionMembership ON SMS_FullCollectionMembership.CollectionID = '##SUB:CollectionID##' AND SMS_FullCollectionMembership.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceID JOIN SMS_UpdateComplianceStatus ON SMS_R_System.ResourceID = SMS_UpdateComplianceStatus.MachineID AND SMS_UpdateComplianceStatus.Status = 2 JOIN SMS_SoftwareUpdate ON SMS_SoftwareUpdate.CI_ID = SMS_UpdateComplianceStatus.CI_ID AND SMS_SoftwareUpdate.IsHidden = 0 AND SMS_SoftwareUpdate.IsExpired = 0 AND SMS_SoftwareUpdate.NumMissing > 0 AND SMS_SoftwareUpdate.IsSuperseded = 0
SELECT * FROM SMS_Collection WHERE CollectionType=2 ORDER BY Name

SecurityFlagsDetailDescription.BitName: NetworkAccess | Modify CH Settings | Enforce Security
CreateTaskSequenceMedia | View CH Settings | Associate | Associate Site System | ModifyPolicy | DeployApplications

QueryDescription.Query: SELECT * FROM SMS_DeploymentSummary WHERE CollectionID='##SUB:CollectionID##'

SELECT cs.* FROM SMS_ClientSettings AS cs JOIN SMS_ClientSettingsAssignment AS csa ON cs.SettingsID=csa.ClientSettingsID JOIN SMS_Collection AS c ON csa.CollectionID=c.CollectionID WHERE csa.CollectionID='##SUB:CollectionID##'
SELECT * FROM SMS_CollectionEvaluationFullAllSite AS cef WHERE cef.CollectionID='##SUB:CollectionID##'
SELECT * FROM SMS_CollectionEvaluationIncrementalAllSite AS cef WHERE cef.CollectionID='##SUB:CollectionID##'

SELECT * FROM SMS_MachineOrchestrationGroup WHERE SMS_MachineOrchestrationGroup.SiteCode IN (SELECT ThisSiteCode FROM SMS_Identification) OR SMS_MachineOrchestrationGroup.SiteCode IN (SELECT SiteCode FROM SMS_SCI_SiteDefinition WHERE SMS_SCI_SiteDefinition.ParentSiteCode IN (SELECT ThisSiteCode FROM SMS_Identification)) ORDER BY Name
SELECT * FROM SMS_MachineOrchestrationGroupScript WHERE MOGID='##SUB:MOGID##' ORDER BY ScriptType
SELECT * FROM SMS_StateMigration ORDER BY SourceName,RestoreName
SELECT * FROM SMS_AICategory WHERE Type=0
SELECT * FROM SMS_AICategory WHERE Type=1
SELECT * FROM SMS_AICategory WHERE Type=2
SELECT * FROM SMS_AISoftwareList
SELECT * FROM SMS_AIHardwareRequirements ORDER BY Product
SELECT GroupName, Category, MainstreamSupportEndDate, ExtendedSupportEndDate, MoreInformationLink, InstallCount FROM SMS_LifecycleDetectedGroups
SELECT * FROM SMS_MeteredProductRule ORDER BY ProductName

AlertDescription.AlertsQuery: SELECT * FROM sms_alert WHERE AlertState=0 and FeatureArea=1 and IsIgnored = 0

QueryDescription.Query: SELECT * FROM sms_configurationitemLatest WHERE (citype_id=3 OR (citype_id=4 AND IsUserDefined=1) OR citype_id=5 OR citype_id=7) ORDER BY localizeddisplayname
SELECT * FROM SMS_ConfigurationBaselineInfo ORDER BY LocalizedDisplayName

SELECT deploy.* FROM SMS_DeploymentSummary deploy INNER JOIN SMS_BaselineAssignment assignment ON deploy.AssignmentID=assignment.AssignmentID INNER JOIN SMS_ConfigurationBaselineInfo baseline ON assignment.AssignedCIs=baseline.CI_ID WHERE baseline.CI_ID=##SUB:CI_ID##
SELECT * FROM SMS_ConfigurationPolicy WHERE IsLatest = 1 AND CategoryInstance_UniqueIDs = 'SettingsAndPolicy:SMS_UserStateManagementSettings' ORDER BY LocalizedDisplayName

SELECT deploy.* FROM SMS_DeploymentSummary deploy INNER JOIN SMS_ConfigurationPolicyAssignment assignment ON deploy.AssignmentID=assignment.AssignmentID INNER JOIN SMS_ConfigurationPolicy configpol ON assignment.AssignedCIs=configpol.CI_ID WHERE configpol.CI_ID=##SUB:CI_ID## AND configpol.CategoryInstance_UniqueIDs='SettingsAndPolicy:SMS_UserStateManagementSettings'
SELECT * FROM SMS_ConfigurationPolicy WHERE IsLatest = 1 AND CategoryInstance_UniqueIDs = 'SettingsAndPolicy:SMS_OneDriveKnownFolderMigrationSettings' ORDER BY LocalizedDisplayName
